speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing alright, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m reaching out regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for providing that. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your identity. According to our records, you have a balance of $450. How would you like to proceed?

speaker: Customer
text: I wasn’t aware of that balance. Can I get more details?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely. This amount is from your last statement dated June 1st. Would you like to make a payment today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of it today. How do I do that?

speaker: Agent
text: You can pay by credit card over the phone or online. Which method do you prefer?

speaker: Customer
text: I'll pay by credit card right now.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I’ll assist you with that. Please hold on while I pull up your account.
